content.raw:

~~~
17: [ RUN      ] twoProcPubSub.PubSubTwoProcsTwoNodes
17/22 Test #17: INTEGRATION_twoProcessesPubSub ..............***Timeout 240.01 sec
~~~

[assertion in DiscoveryTest](https://drone.io/bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign_transport/211)
~~~
